job.description: Tectonic is a leading technology and business services company serving midsized business to enterprise customers with a focus on Insight to Action automation in the cloud Insight to Action is the intersection of big data analytics marketing automation and CRM that provides an integrated approach to automating customer interactionltbrgtltbrgtWe are seeking a Python Data Engineer with the training and curiosity to make bigdata discoveries build the resources necessary to enable those discoveries to be responsible for coordinating activitiesltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtResponsibilitiesltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt Buildown clients data pipelinesltligt ltligt Build data processinganalytics tools for research and tradingltligt ltligt Partner with Traders Quants Researchers and Data Scientists to solve their critical data problems ltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltstronggtltugtRequirementsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgt ltligt 2 years of experience in DataSoftware Engineering Data Science or a related field ltligt ltligt Solid understanding of computer science fundamentals data structures algorithms distributed systems etcltligt ltligt Strong programming background with Python ideallyltligt ltligt Experience with Big DataData Pipelining technologies ex Spark Airflow Kafka etcltligt ltligt Strong problem solving and communication skillsltligt ltligt Interest in working in a fastpacedhighimpact environmentltligt ltbrgtltbrgtltulgtltugtltstronggtBenefitsltbrgtltstronggtltugtltulgt ltligtHealth Care Plan Medical Dental ampamp Visionltligt ltligtRetirement Plan 401k IRAltligt ltligtLife Insurance Basic Voluntary ampamp ADampampDltligt ltligtPaid Time Off Vacation Sick ampamp Public Holidaysltligt ltligtFamily Leave Maternity Paternityltligt ltligtShort Term ampamp Long Term Disabilityltligt ltligtTraining ampamp Developmentltligt ltligtWork From Homeltligtltulgt
